actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 28, 1980 (H. Doc. 96-259) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 28, 1980 (H. Doc. 96-259) for the Geological Survey of the Department of the Interior for exploration of the national petroleum reserve in Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 28, 1980 (H. Doc. 96-259) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
